General.Name: Golden Entertainment Inc
General.Description: Golden Entertainment, Inc. owns and operates a diversified entertainment platform in the United States. The company operates through three segments: Nevada Casino Resorts, Nevada Locals Casinos, and Nevada Taverns. It also operates casino, casino resorts, and taverns. Golden Entertainment, Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: 6595 South Jones Boulevard, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89118
